input_text:
Job Title: Test Engineer

Location: Morristown, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Jobot, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

Test Engineer - Hybrid Schedule and Competitive Salary

This Jobot Job is hosted by: Sean Copeland

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button and sending us your resume.

Salary: $80,000 - $100,000 per year

A bit about us:

We are a growing OEM supplier located in Morristown TN

Why join us?

 Meaningful Work! Best in Class Company! Competitive Compensation Package! Complete Benefits Package! Flexible Work Schedules! Accelerated Career Growth! Fun Company Activities! Many More!

Job Details

Responsibilities include:

Assist in design of new test equipment for all products

 Develop standard test procedures and/or engineering verification procedures Analyze, evaluate, and report test results Establish and maintain reliability schedule and database for assigned product line Work with R&D Engineers and Application Engineers to understand and solve highly complex problems regarding testing Perform test data analysis using test software (GlyphWorks, InField, etc.) to improve test efficiency and reliability Discuss all aspects of test information with Engineers, Management, and/or customer Ensure completion of test reports/projects and department goals as scheduled Determine necessary information needed to understand the test request and design improvements/concepts that are to be tested Determine testing solutions including what instrumentation is needed to verify and validate design modifications and new product development Demonstrate how to utilize data acquisition settings and methods Troubleshoot existing test equipment Work with the Test Supervisor and Test Department personnel to strategically identify and expand our lab, track, and field capabilities and resources Provide input into budgeting and suggest new equipment for purchase Other duties assigned by supervisor 

Qualifications:

 Must have a Bachelor's degree in Mechanical, Mechatronics, Ag. Sciences Engineering discipline or equivalent Preferred two+ years experience as Test Engineer or Test/Engineering Technician or equivalent Demonstrate a high degree of initiative and motivation and willingness to work proactively, either independently or with a team Proficient in Microsoft Office Applications Inventor or 3D CAD is a plus Test data analysis experience preferred Understand basic hydraulic, pneumatic, and electrical systems Knowledge of the following test instrumentation: data acquisition equipment, strain gauges, load cells, potentiometers, thermocouples, pressure transducers, torque transducers, speed encoders, accelerometers, flow meters, sound/noise meters PLC/LabView programming and 3D Printing experience is a plus Strong technical writing skills preferred

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Test Engineer
output_json.summary: Jobot seeks a Test Engineer with a hybrid schedule and competitive salary.
required_skills: Strategically identifying lab, track, and field capabilities
optional_skills: Basic hydraulic, pneumatic, and electrical systems knowledge
job_responsibilities: Work with R&D Engineers and Application Engineers
Use test software to improve efficiency and reliability
Discuss test information with Engineers, Management, and customers
Complete test reports/projects and department goals
Determine necessary information for test requests
Expand lab, track, and field capabilities
Demonstrate data acquisition settings and methods
Work with Test Supervisor and Test Department personnel
output_json.company_information: Growing OEM supplier located in Morristown TN
